S-A Podcast Episode 1 - The Battle of Nagashino and Its Context in the Mili=
tary Revolution (Part 1)

http://bit.ly/joENXo

Our first podcast of our ne=
w series, The Battle of Nagashino and Its Context in the Military Revolutio=
n examines the battle of Nagashino, and how it fits in to the "Military Rev=
olution" theory supported by historians such as Geoffrey Parker and Delmar =
Brown.  We examine the history of the battle, the biases of the sources, th=
e "accepted" history of the battle of Nagashino, and where this all fits in=
 the context of the Military Revolution theory.
